statements: SELECT user_name, access_level FROM sas_user_access WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT department_name, user_name, access_level FROM sas_user_access WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM sas_user_access;
SELECT user_name, department_name FROM sas_user_access WHERE department_name = 'Sales' AND access_level = 'Manager';
SELECT access_level, user_name, department_name FROM sas_user_access WHERE access_level = 'User' ORDER BY department_name ASC;
SELECT user_name, access_level FROM sas_user_access WHERE department_name = 'Finance';
SELECT user_name, department_name FROM sas_user_access WHERE access_level = 'Admin' ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT user_name, access_level, department_name FROM sas_user_access WHERE access_level = 'User' ORDER BY department_name ASC, user_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sas_user_access WHERE department_name LIKE '%Sales%' ORDER BY user_name ASC, access_level DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, access_level, department_name FROM sas_user_access WHERE access_level IN ('Admin', 'User') ORDER BY access_level DESC, department_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE user_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM access_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 2 AND action LIKE '%login%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE permissions->'level' = '1' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT users.username, access_logs.timestamp FROM users INNER JOIN access_logs ON users.user_id = access_logs.user_id WHERE users.role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM user_roles;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name, user_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE user_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM user_roles;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name, permission_name FROM role_permissions WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, permission_name FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY permission_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT role_name FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions;
SELECT username, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT group_name FROM data_groups WHERE group_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT u.username, d.group_name FROM user_permissions u INNER JOIN group_permissions gp ON u.id = gp.permission_id INNER JOIN data_groups d ON gp.group_id = d.group_id;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level > 2;
SELECT group_name, permission_level FROM data_groups JOIN user_permissions ON user_permissions.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT log_id, action_taken, username FROM audit_logs JOIN user_permissions ON audit_logs.user_id = user_permissions.id;
SELECT * FROM group_permissions WHERE group_id = 1 AND permission_id = 3;
SELECT u.username, a.action_taken, g.group_name FROM user_permissions u, audit_logs a, data_groups g WHERE u.id = a.user_id AND a.log_id < 100;
SELECT * FROM user_roles
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions
SELECT role_id, COUNT(permission_id) AS permission_count FROM role_permissions GROUP BY role_id
SELECT user_id, session_id, session_start, session_end FROM user_sessions ORDER BY session_start DESC
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 3;
SELECT role_name, permission_name FROM roles r JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id WHERE rp.role_id = 4;
SELECT user_id, session_start, session_end FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id = 5;
